item.title: CVC牵头13亿美元交易，支持英国能源公司Low Carbon
item.description: 英国绿色电力开发商 Low Carbon 在一项交易中筹集了 11 亿英镑（13 亿美元）的资金，CVC Capital Partners 将成为该公司的大股东。【原文：British green-power developer Low Carbon has raised £1.1 billion ($1.3 billion) in a deal that will result in CVC Capital Partners becoming the company’s majority owner.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的阿通伯格据说计划在印度首次公开募股 2 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）支持的 Atomberg Technologies Pvt.【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte-backed Atomberg Technologies Pvt. is weighing an initial public offering in Mumbai that may raise around $200 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济学家称印度经济意外增长降低了印度央行降息几率
item.description: 尽管通胀率创历史新低，但印度上一季度出人意料的强劲经济增长降低了央行在本周政策会议上降息的可能性。【原文：India’s unexpectedly strong economic growth last quarter has reduced chances of an interest rate cut at this week’s central bank’s policy meeting despite record-low inflation.】

item.title: 棕榈油连续三天上涨，马来西亚库存成为焦点
item.description: 棕榈油在过去三个交易日上涨后趋于稳定，强劲的马来西亚库存将限制其进一步涨幅。【原文：Palm oil steadied after advancing the past three sessions, with robust Malaysian inventories poised to cap further gains.】

item.title: 澳门博彩收入超出预期，原因是高端玩家热情高涨
item.description: 澳门博彩业收入在 11 月份增长了 14.4%，超过了分析师的预期，因为这个世界上最大的博彩中心继续通过各种优惠和活动吸引大赌客。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.4% in November, exceeding analysts’ expectation as the world’s biggest gambling hub continues to draw big bettors with perks and events.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商在欧洲的销售份额从创纪录水平回落
item.description: 10 月份，中国汽车制造商在欧洲的市场份额从一个月前创纪录的水平上有所下滑。【原文：Chinese carmakers lost ground in Europe in October, slipping back from the record market share they captured a month earlier across the region.】

item.title: 交易员等待美国数据，新兴股市和货币走高
item.description: 由于对美联储 12 月降息的押注保持坚挺，新兴市场股市周一上扬，货币持稳。【原文：Emerging-market stocks edged up Monday, with currencies steady as bets on a December rate cut by the Federal Reserve held firm.】

item.title: 印度罕见地长期购买大豆以确保廉价供应
item.description: 印度买家已确保在截至 7 月份的四个月内大量采购豆油，这是预期竞争对手棕榈油价格上涨而采取的罕见举措。【原文：Indian buyers have secured large purchases of soybean oil for the four months to July, a rare move in anticipation of rising prices of rival palm oil.】

item.title: 中国太阳能行业持续低迷，晶澳太阳能就专利纠纷达成和解
item.description: 中国四大太阳能公司之一的晶澳太阳能科技有限公司（JA Solar Technology Co.【原文：JA Solar Technology Co., one of China’s top four solar companies, said it agreed to settle patent lawsuits with a domestic rival, a sign that manufacturers in the country are opting for cooperation to survive an industry-wide downturn.】

item.title: 圭亚那石油长途跋涉运往印度，以替代俄罗斯桶装石油
item.description: 两艘超级油轮已经开始在从圭亚那到印度的漫长而不寻常的航程中运送原油，因为南亚国家的炼油厂正在抢购被制裁的俄罗斯原油的替代品。【原文：Two supertankers have begun hauling crude on a lengthy and unusual voyage from Guyana to India, as refiners in the South Asian nation snap up alternatives to sanctioned Russian crude.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称目前利率处于 "良好位置
item.description: 理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，他对欧洲中央银行的货币政策设置感到满意。【原文：Governing Council member Joachim Nagel suggested that he’s comfortable with the European Central Bank’s monetary-policy settings.】

item.title: 印度计划在消费税改革后对部分烟草产品征收新税
item.description: 印度将对用于生产烟草相关产品的机器征收新的健康和国家安全税，并修订商品和服务税制度下的现行补偿税。【原文：India is set to introduce a new health and national security tax on machines used to produce a tobacco-related product, and amend the current compensation levy under the goods and services tax regime.】

item.title: 莫迪寻求议会批准全面改革以刺激增长
item.description: 作为吸引外资和促进增长计划的一部分，纳伦德拉-莫迪总理的政府将在即将召开的议会会议上推出全面的经济改革。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government is set to introduce sweeping economic reforms in the upcoming parliament session as part of a plan to attract foreign investment and boost growth.】

item.title: 菲律宾制造业因需求疲软跌至四年新低
item.description: 消费需求疲软迫使菲律宾制造商在 11 月份削减了工厂产量和工作岗位，成为该地区唯一一个与经济扩张背道而驰的国家。【原文：Weak consumer demand forced Philippine manufacturers to cut factory output and jobs in November, becoming the only nation to buck expansion in the region.】

item.title: 美国公司寻求贷款购买 Nvidia 芯片供小红书使用
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一家总部位于美国的人工智能公司正在寻求约 3 亿美元的贷款，以帮助一家中国客户购买先进的英伟达（Nvidia）公司芯片在日本使用。【原文：A US-based artificial intelligence firm is seeking a loan of about $300 million to help fund the purchase of advanced Nvidia Corp. chips for use in Japan by a Chinese client, according to people familiar with the matter, a rare case of financiers being tapped to support such deals.】

item.title: 新加坡限制学生在校期间使用智能手机
item.description: 新加坡将从 1 月起禁止在中学使用智能手机和智能手表，各国正在讨论如何限制儿童接触数字设备。【原文：Singapore will bar the use of smartphones and smartwatches in secondary schools starting in January, as countries debate how to curb children’s access to digital devices.】

item.title: 印尼承诺实现货币与增长平衡，这可能会对印尼盾起到缓冲作用
item.description: 分析师说，印尼央行誓言在努力促进经济增长的同时优先考虑货币稳定，这可能会在投资者回避印尼资产之际对印尼盾起到缓冲作用。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s vow to prioritize currency stability as it tries to boost growth may cushion the rupiah at a time when investors are avoiding the nation’s assets, analysts said.】

item.title: Citadel 和 Point72 校友将领导新的日本对冲基金
item.description: 前 Citadel 投资组合经理 Takeo Serizawa 将加入一家新的专注于日本的对冲基金，与 Point72 Asset Management LP 的日本负责人 Tomohiro Yamaguchi 合作，挖掘投资者对日本的兴趣。【原文：Former Citadel portfolio manager Takeo Serizawa will join a new Japan-focused hedge fund, teaming up with one-time Point72 Asset Management LP’s Japan head Tomohiro Yamaguchi, to tap investor interest in the country.】

item.title: 印度国内生产总值连续六个季度高速增长，印度股市有望跳涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 香港大亨郑裕彤寻求出售部分紫檀酒店
item.description: 香港富豪郑家纯正在为家族豪华酒店集团 Rosewood Hotel Group 旗下的物业寻找买家，因为这个亿万富豪家族正在努力克服其房地产部门新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong tycoon Henry Cheng is seeking buyers for properties in the family’s luxury Rosewood Hotel Group as the billionaire clan races to overcome liquidity challenges connected to its real estate unit New World Development Co.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡计划设立基金，从约 20 年来最严重的风暴中重建家园
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克（Anura Kumara Dissanayake）表示，斯里兰卡正在设立一个基金，以修复迪特瓦飓风造成的损失，因为这个岛国正面临着 "最大、最具挑战性的自然灾害"。【原文：Sri Lanka is setting up a fund to repair damage from Cyclone Ditwah as the island nation faces its “largest and most challenging natural disaster,” President Anura Kumara Dissanayake said.】

item.title: 增长降温，中国私营工厂指数意外下降
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，由于新订单几乎停滞，11 月份中国制造业活动出人意料地出现了四个月来的首次萎缩，这使得经济放缓加深的迹象更加令人担忧。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity surprisingly contracted in November for the first time in four months as new orders almost stalled, according to a private survey, adding to worrying signs about the economy’s deepening slowdown.】

item.title: S&P 称达纳塔拉筹资计划提高了财政灵活性
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司称，印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）的融资战略为政府管理其财政和庞大的国有企业提供了更大的灵活性。【原文：A strategy by Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara to raise capital is offering the government more flexibility in managing its finances and sprawling state-owned firms, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: ASX 开始解决公司公告长达数小时的中断问题
item.description: 澳大利亚主要交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）在长达数小时的故障后恢复发布公司声明。【原文：Australia’s main exchange operator ASX Ltd. resumed publishing company statements after an hours-long outage.】

item.title: 印度交易商寄希望于印度央行购买债券推动经济增长
item.description: 印度的债券交易员们认为，随着当前的宽松周期接近尾声，印度央行将在未来几个月恢复购买国债，这一决定将刺激债券收益。【原文：Bond traders in India are positioning for the central bank to resume buying government debt in the coming months, a decision they say will spur gains as the current easing cycle approaches its end.】

item.title: 日本央行上田明确暗示 12 月加息的可能性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫发出了迄今为止最明确的暗示，即日本央行董事会可能会在本月采取行动，并指出当局将就是否加息做出正确决定。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda sent the clearest hint yet that his board might move this month, noting that authorities will make the right call on whether to raise interest rates or not.】

item.title: 万科风波后，中国房屋销售私人数据黯然失色
item.description: 在国家支持的中国万科公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Two of China’s private data agencies skipped releasing data on monthly home sales by the country’s top developers, after state-backed China Vanke Co. stirred market concerns with its bond extension bid.】

item.title: 迪士尼《动物世界 2》在中国首映取得 2.72 亿美元的好成绩
item.description: 迪斯尼公司的《动物世界 2》（Zootopia 2）在中国取得了 2.72 亿美元的票房，成为中国有史以来第二大开画票房的外国电影，为美国制片厂在中国这一重要市场的发展注入了活力。【原文：Walt Disney Co.’s Zootopia 2 pulled in $272 million to claim China’s second-biggest opening ever for a foreign film, boosting the US studio in a key market.】

item.title: 周五伦敦金属交易所铜价创下历史新高后美国铜价上涨
item.description: 周五，铜在伦敦金属交易所创下历史新高后，在美国出现上涨，长达数小时的停牌加剧了供应紧张。【原文：Copper rose in the US after hitting a record high on the London Metal Exchange on Friday, with supply tightness exacerbated by an hours-long halt to trading.】

item.title: 日本两年期收益率因加息押注创 2008 年以来新高
item.description: 日本两年期国债收益率升至2008年以来的最高水平，日元兑美元汇率上涨，因为有迹象表明日本央行加息的脚步越来越近了。【原文：Japan’s two-year note yield rose to its highest level since 2008 and the yen gained against the dollar on signs an interest-rate hike by the Bank of Japan is getting closer.】
